itemListElement.name: Vegan Gluten free Cinnamon Roll Bread – Yeast-free (no added yeast)

@graph.name: Vegan Gluten free Cinnamon Roll Bread Yeast-Free
@graph.description: Vegan Gluten free Cinnamon Roll Bread - Yeast-free Gluten-free Grain-free Cinnamon bread Recipe. Soft, fluffy and amazing . Can be nut-free.  Besan(chickpea flour) Batter with cinnamon sugar swirls
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup besan ((gram flour), will also work with chickpea flour, but will need more icing for added moisture)
1/4 cup fine or powdered sugar (,1 tbsp more for sweeter)
1/4 cup  sugar ((I use a combination of coconut sugar and cane or powdered))
1.5 tsp cinnamon (, + a good pinch of nutmeg and cardamom if you wish)

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a deep casserole dish (I use 1.5 qt, 9.5 by 7.5 inch),and keep ready. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. In a bowl, whisk in all the dry ingredients to combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a deep casserole dish (I use 1.5 qt, 9.5 by 7.5 inch),and keep ready. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. In a bowl, whisk in all the dry ingredients to combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the lemon, vinegar, vanilla and water and mix well. Add the mixture and oil to the dry bowl and whisk to combine really well. The batter will start to increase in volume with air and will become thick and fluffy. Set aside for 2 mins
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the lemon, vinegar, vanilla and water and mix well. Add the mixture and oil to the dry bowl and whisk to combine really well. The batter will start to increase in volume with air and will become thick and fluffy. Set aside for 2 mins

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the sugar and cinnamon for the filling and a good pinch of salt and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the sugar and cinnamon for the filling and a good pinch of salt and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the fluffy batter into the prepared dish. Sprinkle some of the sugar cinnamon mixture and swirl it around. Drop more of the batter and more of the sugar cinnamon mixture. Drizzle oil on top in the end.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the fluffy batter into the prepared dish. Sprinkle some of the sugar cinnamon mixture and swirl it around. Drop more of the batter and more of the sugar cinnamon mixture. Drizzle oil on top in the end.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the casserole with a parchment and a baking sheet to seal. Bake for 14 to 15 minutes. Take the casserole out and let it sit covered with parchment for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the casserole with a parchment and a baking sheet to seal. Bake for 14 to 15 minutes. Take the casserole out and let it sit covered with parchment for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a drizzle of melted vegan butter or icing and serve while hot. To store, cover and store on the counter for a few hours, those these are best fresh and warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a drizzle of melted vegan butter or icing and serve while hot. To store, cover and store on the counter for a few hours, those these are best fresh and warm.

@graph.keywords: gluten free cinnamon roll, grain free cinnamon roll, vegan cinnamon roll bread
